Package com.codigofacilito.fastmatrix

Class MatrixSolveSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codigofacilito.fastmatrix.MatrixSolveSystem
  • public class MatrixSolveSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The MatrixSolveSystem class provides methods to solve a system of linear equations using Gaussian elimination. It includes private methods for performing pivoting, converting a matrix to upper triangular form, and diagonalizing the matrix, as well as a public method to solve the system using these techniques.
